1.0.0.name: wordpress/strapvert
1.0.0.description: StrapVert - a clean and elegant theme for those who like to showcase their content. Ideal for the designer/artist as well as for magazine and business type websites. [NEW: Now with option to turn the entire Featured section, just the top section or just the secondary section off!]
